select n.noti_no,n.sender_user,n.noti_type,n.message,n.noti_date, Left(group_concat(CONCAT( SUBSTRING(r.recipient_mem, 1, 3), '-', SUBSTRING(r.recipient_mem, 4, 4), '-', SUBSTRING(r.recipient_mem, 8, 4) ) separator ', '),43) as recipient_mem, substring(group_concat(CONCAT( SUBSTRING(r.recipient_mem, 1, 3), '-', SUBSTRING(r.recipient_mem, 4, 4), '-', SUBSTRING(r.recipient_mem, 8, 4) ) separator ', '),44) as recipient_more, COUNT(r.recipient_mem)-3 as recipient_count from notification n left join recipient r on n.noti_no = r.noti_no group by n.noti_no order by n.noti_no desc limit #{pageStart},${pageSize}

SELECT class_status, m.mem_no, field_code, COUNT(field_code) as class_count FROM registration r JOIN member m ON m.mem_no = r.mem_no JOIN classSchedule cs ON cs.schedule_id = r.schedule_no JOIN class c ON c.class_no = cs.class_no WHERE m.mem_no = #{mem_no} and (status = '종료') GROUP BY m.mem_no, field_code

select count(m.mem_no) as class_count from registration r join member m on m.mem_no = r.mem_no join classSchedule cs on cs.schedule_id = r.schedule_no join class c on c.class_no = cs.class_no where m.mem_no = #{mem_no} and status = #{status}
select *, name as manager_name from healthMonitor join employee on manager_no = user_no where mem_no = #{mem_no} order by inbody_date desc limit #{pageStart},1

select * from ( select inbody_no, LEFT(inbody_date, 7) as inbody_date, weight, muscle, fat from healthMonitor where mem_no = #{mem_no} order by inbody_date desc limit 6 ) as changeBody_data order by inbody_date asc
mapper.insert: insert into healthMonitor (mem_no, manager_no, inbody_date, exercise_goal, height, weight, fat, fat_mass, muscle, muscle_mass, belly_fat, bmi, bmr, consult_content) values (#{mem_no}, #{manager_no}, #{inbody_date}, #{exercise_goal}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{fat}, #{fat_mass}, #{muscle}, #{muscle_mass}, #{belly_fat}, #{bmi}, #{bmr}, #{consult_content})
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( SUM( CASE WHEN cs.start_date IS NOT NULL AND cs.end_date IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(cs.end_date, cs.start_date) ELSE 0 END ), 0) AS class_count FROM registration r JOIN classSchedule cs ON cs.schedule_id = r.schedule_no WHERE r.mem_no = #{mem_no}
